name: 3R3BU
description:
3R3BU
SPECIAL ARTWORK FOR CELEBRATING 3.000 FOLLOWERS ON TWITTER. 


PAIN (original tittle)
Sometimes, when I look deeper into a very painful wound, I find something amazing.
Beyond my predictions and common sense.
It shows that somehow painful gives beauty essence into my soul.
Only matter of time before we all realize it.
Take a look closer to what painful is, finds its own beauty.

“Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.” -Buddha


Watercolor on paper 200gsm
2602 × 3552 px

Personal use only.
